work.summary: Hired to develop and lead a variety of projects from project management tools to 3D content delivery services using a variety of toolsets.
highlights: Designed and built the backend using .NET Core for a project management tool which won an innovation award for the company with its unique design.
Designed and built the backend for a 3D content decisioning and delivery platform. It was developed using Typescript/Node with Kubernetes in a microservice architecture.

work.summary: Hired to develop, test and maintain mobile applications for the retail sector using Xamarin.
highlights: Developed, tested and maintained a stock management application targeting Android devices as part of a small team. This app had to integrate with a variety of hardware barcode scanners and provided a barcode scanning solution using in built cameras.

Developed, tested and maintained the client applications (iOS, Android and Windows Phone) for the music streaming service as part of a medium sized team, meeting needs laid out by product owners and the business.
Tasked to improve the engagement of push notifications provided by the Android application.

Developed, tested and maintained a stock management application targeting Android devices as part of a small team. This app had to integrate with a variety of hardware barcode scanners and provided a barcode scanning solution using in built cameras.
